    B

    Budget - Class in Unnamed Package
    The Budget class will handle all budget related operations such as transactions, updating, creating, deleting, and reading in from CSV files
    Budget(Account) - Constructor for class Budget
    Constructs a Budget instance for a specific account

    G

    getAmount() - Method in class Transaction
    Returns the amount of money added or withdrawn.
    getCategory() - Method in class Transaction
    Returns the category of the transaction.
    getDay() - Method in class Transaction
    Returns the day of the month the transaction took place.
    getMonth() - Method in class Transaction
    Returns the month the transaction took place.
    getYear() - Method in class Transaction
    Returns the year the transaction took place.
    getYears() - Method in class Budget
    Returns a list of years (based on files present in the saved files directory), or null upon failure to read the data directory.

    M

    main(String[]) - Static method in class Budget
    Just for testing.

    P

    promptToCreateOrUpdate() - Method in class Budget
    Prompts the user for the path to the file to save.

    R

    readCSV(int) - Method in class Budget
    Reads a CSV file for a given year and returns a list of transactions, or null if the file for that year is missing, has the wrong type, or contains invalid data.

    T

    Transaction - Class in Unnamed Package
    Represents one transaction, i.e.
    Transaction(String, String, long) - Constructor for class Transaction
    Constructs a Transaction object, assuming the date and category are valid.
